00043 #ifndef __OPENCV_STITCHING_CAMERA_HPP__
00044 #define __OPENCV_STITCHING_CAMERA_HPP__
00045 
00046 #include "opencv2/core/core.hpp"
00047 
00048 namespace cv {
00049 namespace detail {
00050 
00051 struct CV_EXPORTS CameraParams
00052 {
00053     CameraParams();
00054     CameraParams(const CameraParams& other);
00055     const CameraParams& operator =(const CameraParams& other);
00056     Mat K() const;
00057 
00058     double focal; // Focal length
00059     double aspect; // Aspect ratio
00060     double ppx; // Principal point X
00061     double ppy; // Principal point Y
00062     Mat R; // Rotation
00063     Mat t; // Translation
00064 };
00065 
00066 } // namespace detail
00067 } // namespace cv
00068 
00069 #endif // #ifndef __OPENCV_STITCHING_CAMERA_HPP__
